original: stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid med /

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is empty of the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽And why?🔽In emptiness there is no emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do /
translated: There is no bodhisattva.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: The emptiness of what transcends limits is empty of the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med /

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: There is no bodhisattva.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: The emptiness of what is not to be discarded is empty of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das @44a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das @44a *//
translated: In emptiness there is no emptiness of what is not to be discarded.🔽There is no bodhisattva.🔽The emptiness of nature is empty of the emptiness of nature.🔽And why?

original: pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: pa stong pa nyid med /

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: There is no bodhisattva.🔽The emptiness of all dharmas is empty of the emptiness of all dharmas.🔽And why?🔽In emptiness there is no emptiness of all dharmas.🔽There is no bodhisattva.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?🔽In emptiness there is no emptiness of its own mark.🔽There is no bodhisattva.

original: stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the inexhaustible is empty of the emptiness of the inexhaustible.🔽And why?🔽In emptiness there is no emptiness of the inexhaustible.

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: There is no bodhisattva.

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /

translated: Why is that?

original: stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med /

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /

analyzed: stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid med /

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //

translated: and no bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //

analyzed: nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: stong pa nyid la nyan thos med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la nyan thos med /

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ste /
translated: Pratyekabuddhas are empty of pratyekabuddhas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas med /
translated: Emptiness is not pratyekabuddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //🔽de bzhin gshegs @47a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do // de bzhin gshegs @47a *//
translated: and it is not bodhisattvas.

original: pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste /
analyzed: pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: stong pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa med /
translated: The Tathāgata is not in emptiness,

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: for this reason, the so-called bodhisattva and form do not exist and are not found.

original: tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The so-called bodhisattva and feeling do not exist and are not found.

original: 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The so-called bodhisattva and perception do not exist and are not found.

original: 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The so-called bodhisattva and volitional factors do not exist and are not found.

original: rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The so-called bodhisattva and consciousness do not exist and are not found.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang yang 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs na byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig /
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs na byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig /
translated: And if someone were to say, I do not apprehend anywhere or in any way the bodhisattva at all,🔽so what bodhisattva and what perfection of wisdom should I instruct and demonstrate?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya zhes zer ba ci'i phyir de skad smras zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya zhes zer ba ci'i phyir de skad smras zhes zer ba ni /
translated: what would you say to him, venerable Śāriputra?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra replied,

original: gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form is not found or apprehended in form.

original: gzugs ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form is not found or apprehended in feeling.

original: tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Feeling is not found or apprehended in feeling.

original: tshor ba ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Feeling is not found or apprehended in form.

original: gzugs dang tshor ba ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang tshor ba ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form and feeling are not found or apprehended in perception.

original: 'du shes @47b ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du shes @47b ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Perception is not found or apprehended in perception.

original: 'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Perception is not found or apprehended in form and feeling.

original: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form, feeling, and perception are not found in volitional factors and are not apprehended.

original: 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Volitional factors are not found in volitional factors and are not apprehended.

original: 'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Volitional factors are not found in form, feeling, and perception and are not apprehended.

original: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form, feeling, perception, and volitional factors are not found in consciousness and are not apprehended.

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness is not found in consciousness and is not apprehended.

original: rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness is not found in form, feeling, perception, and volitional factors and is not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the eyes are not found in the eyes and are not apprehended.

original: mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eyes are not found in the ears and are not apprehended.

original: rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The ears are not found in the ears and are not apprehended.

original: rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The ears are not found in the eyes and are not apprehended.

original: mig dang rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig dang rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eyes and ears do not exist in the nose and are not found there.

original: sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose does not exist in the nose and is not found there.

original: sna ni mig dang rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna ni mig dang rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The nose does not exist in the eyes and ears and is not found there.

original: mig dang rna ba dang sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig dang rna ba dang sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eyes, ears, and nose do not exist in the tongue and are not found there.

original: lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue does not exist in the tongue and is not found there.

original: lce ni mig dang rna ba dang sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce ni mig dang rna ba dang sna la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue does not exist in the eyes, ears, and nose and is not found there.

original: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eyes, ears, nose, and tongue do not exist in the body and are not found there.

original: lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The body does not exist in the body and is not found there.

original: lus ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽mig dang rna ba dang sna dang @48a *//
analyzed: lus ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la med cing mi dmigs so // mig dang rna ba dang sna dang @48a *//
translated: The body does not exist in the eyes, ears, nose, and tongue and is not found there.

original: lce dang lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce dang lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and body do not exist in the mind and are not found there.

original: yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The mind does not exist in the mind and is not found there.

original: yid ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The mind does not exist in the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and body and is not found there.

original: gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form does not exist in form and is not found there.

original: gzugs ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form is not found and is not apprehended in sound.

original: sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Sound is not found and is not apprehended in sound.

original: sgra ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sgra ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Sound is not found and is not apprehended in form.

original: gzugs dang sgra ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form and sound are not found and are not apprehended in smell.

original: dri ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dri ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Smell is not found and is not apprehended in smell.

original: dri ni gzugs dang sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dri ni gzugs dang sgra la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Smell is not found and is not apprehended in form and sound.

original: gzugs dang sgra dang dri ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dang dri ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form, sound, and smell are not found and are not apprehended in taste.

original: ro ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ro ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Taste is not found and is not apprehended in taste.

original: ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Taste is not found and is not apprehended in form, sound, and smell.

original: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form, sound, smell, and taste are not found and are not apprehended in tactility.

original: reg ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: reg ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Tactility is not found and is not apprehended in tactility.

original: reg ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: reg ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Tactility is not found and is not apprehended in form, sound, smell, and taste.

original: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Form, sound, smell, taste, and tactility are not found and are not apprehended in mental phenomena.

original: chos ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Mental phenomena are not found and are not apprehended in mental phenomena.

original: chos ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The Dharma is not in form, sound, smell, taste, and touch, and is not found there.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Eye consciousness is not in eye consciousness and is not found there.

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Eye consciousness is not in ear consciousness and is not found there.

analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa @48b la med cing mi dmigs so //

analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ear consciousness is not in eye consciousness and is not found there.

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //

translated: the ear consciousness is not found and is not apprehended

translated: in the eye consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //

analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so // mig gi 'dus te reg pa las @50a *//
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact does not exist and is not found in the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact does not exist and is not found in the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact does not exist and is not found in the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //

translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact and the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact do not exist and are not found in the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so // sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so // mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness of smell does not exist in the feeling that arises from the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness of smell.🔽The feeling that arises from the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness of smell does not exist in the feeling that arises from the union of eye, form, and the consciousness of eye.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the union of eye, form, and the consciousness of eye, the feeling that arises from the union of ear, sound, and the consciousness of ear, and the feeling that arises from the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness of nose do not exist in the feeling that arises from the union of tongue, taste, and the consciousness of tongue.🔽The feeling that arises from the union of tongue, taste, and the consciousness of tongue does not exist in the feeling that arises from the union of tongue, taste, and the consciousness of tongue.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba @50b dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba @50b dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the tongue contact is not found and is not apprehended in the feeling that arises from eye contact,🔽the feeling that arises from ear contact, or the feeling that arises from nose contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from eye contact, the feeling that arises from ear contact, the feeling that arises from nose contact, and the feeling that arises from tongue contact are not found and are not apprehended in the feeling that arises from body contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from body contact is not found and is not apprehended in the feeling that arises from body contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so // mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the coming together of body and contact is not found and is not apprehended in the feeling that arises from the coming together of eye and contact,🔽the feeling that arises from the coming together of ear and contact, the feeling that arises from the coming together of nose and contact, the feeling that arises from the coming together of tongue and contact, or the feeling that arises from the coming together of body and contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the coming together of eye and contact, the feeling that arises from the coming together of ear and contact, the feeling that arises from the coming together of nose and contact, the feeling that arises from the coming together of tongue and contact, and the feeling that arises from the coming together of body and contact are not found and are not apprehended in the feeling that arises from the coming together of mind and contact.🔽The feeling that arises from the coming together of mind and contact is not found and is not apprehended in the feeling that arises from the coming together of mind and contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba @51a *//

translated: Feelings that arise from the sensory contact of the mind are not found and are not apprehended in the sensory contact of the eyes,🔽in the sensory contact of the ears, in the sensory contact of the nose,

original: dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so ////
analyzed: dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so ////
translated: in the sensory contact of the tongue, or in the sensory contact of the body.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po gya gcig pa //
analyzed: bam po gya gcig pa //

analyzed: sa'i khams ni sa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The earth element is not found and is not apprehended in the earth element.

original: sa'i khams ni chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sa'i khams ni chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The earth element is not found and is not apprehended in the water element.

original: chu'i khams ni chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chu'i khams ni chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The water element is not found and is not apprehended in the water element.

original: chu'i khams ni sa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chu'i khams ni sa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The water element is not found and is not apprehended in the earth element.

original: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams ni me'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams ni me'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The earth element and the water element are not found and are not apprehended in the fire element.

original: me'i khams ni me'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: me'i khams ni me'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the fire element is not found and is not apprehended in the fire element.

original: me'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: me'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The fire element is not found and is not apprehended in the earth element and the water element.

original: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams ni rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams ni rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The earth element, the water element, and the fire element are not found and are not apprehended in the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The wind element is not found and is not apprehended in the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rlung gi khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The wind element is not found and is not apprehended in the earth element, the water element, and the fire element.

original: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The earth element, the water element, the fire element, and the wind element are not found and are not apprehended in the space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The space element is not found and is not apprehended in the space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs @51b so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs @51b so //
translated: The space element is not found and is not apprehended in the earth element, the water element, the fire element, and the wind element.

original: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The earth element is not found and is not apprehended in the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The consciousness element is not found and is not apprehended in the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The consciousness element is not found and is not apprehended in the earth element, the water element, the fire element, the wind element, or the space element.

original: ma rig pa ni ma rig pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni ma rig pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance is not found and is not apprehended in ignorance.

original: ma rig pa ni 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance is not found and is not apprehended in the formative factors.

original: 'du byed ni 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed ni 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The formative factors are not found and are not apprehended in the formative factors.

original: 'du byed ni ma rig pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed ni ma rig pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The formative factors are not found and are not apprehended in ignorance.

original: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance and the formative factors are not found and are not apprehended in consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness is not found and is not apprehended in consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness is not found and is not apprehended in ignorance and formative predispositions.

original: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ming dang gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ming dang gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance and formative predispositions are not found and are not apprehended in consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Name and form are not found and are not apprehended in name and form.

original: ming dang gzugs ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Name and form are not found and are not apprehended in ignorance, formative predispositions, and consciousness.

original: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs ni skye mched drug la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs ni skye mched drug la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance, formative predispositions, consciousness, and name and form are not found and are not apprehended in the six sense fields.

original: skye mched drug ni skye mched drug la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽skye mched drug ni ma rig pa @52a *//
analyzed: skye mched drug ni skye mched drug la med cing mi dmigs so // skye mched drug ni ma rig pa @52a *//
translated: The six sense fields are not found and are not apprehended in the six sense fields.🔽The six sense fields are not found and are not apprehended in ignorance,

original: dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: formative predispositions, consciousness, and name and form.

original: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug ni reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug ni reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance, volitions, consciousness, name and form, and the six sense sources do not exist and are not found in contact.

original: reg pa ni reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: reg pa ni reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Contact does not exist and is not found in contact.

original: reg pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: reg pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Contact does not exist and is not found in ignorance, volitions, consciousness, name and form, and the six sense sources.

original: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance, volitions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, and contact do not exist and are not found in feeling.

original: tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Feeling does not exist and is not found in feeling.

original: tshor ba ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Feeling does not exist and is not found in ignorance, volitions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, and contact.

original: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba ni sred pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba ni sred pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance, volitions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, and feeling do not exist and are not apprehended in craving.

original: sred pa ni sred pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sred pa ni sred pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Craving does not exist and is not apprehended in craving.

original: sred pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sred pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Craving does not exist and is not apprehended in ignorance, volitions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, or feeling.

original: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / @52b reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa ni len pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / @52b reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa ni len pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance, volitions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, and craving do not exist and are not apprehended in grasping.

original: len pa ni len pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: len pa ni len pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Grasping does not exist and is not apprehended in grasping.

original: len pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang sred pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: len pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang sred pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Appropriation does not exist and is not apprehended in ignorance, formative predispositions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense fields, contact, sensation, craving, and grasping.

original: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa ni srid pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa ni srid pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance, formative predispositions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense fields, contact, sensation, craving, and grasping do not exist and are not apprehended in existence.

original: srid pa ni srid pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: srid pa ni srid pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Existence does not exist and is not apprehended in existence.

original: srid pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: srid pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Existence does not exist and is not apprehended in ignorance, formative predispositions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense fields, contact, sensation, craving, and grasping.

original: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa ni skye ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa ni skye ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance, volitions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, and existence are not found and are not apprehended in birth.

original: skye ba ni skye ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye ba ni skye ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Birth is not found and is not apprehended in birth.

original: skye ba ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor @53a *//
analyzed: skye ba ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa la med cing mi dmigs so // ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor @53a *//
translated: Birth is not found and is not apprehended in ignorance, volitions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, or existence.

original: ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang skye ba ni rga shi la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang skye ba ni rga shi la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Ignorance, volitions, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, existence, and birth are not found and are not apprehended in aging and death.

original: rga shi ni rga shi la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rga shi ni rga shi la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: old age and death is not found in old age and death and is not apprehended.🔽old age and death is not found in ignorance and the formations, and is not apprehended;

original: rga shi ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba la med cing mi dmigs so /
analyzed: rga shi ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba la med cing mi dmigs so /
translated: old age and death is not found in consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense spheres, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, existence, birth, and aging and death, and is not apprehended.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of giving is not found in the perfection of giving and is not apprehended.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of giving is not found in the perfection of morality and is not apprehended.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of morality is not found in the perfection of morality and is not apprehended.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of morality is not found in the perfection of giving and is not apprehended.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of generosity and the perfection of moral discipline do not exist and are not found in the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of patience does not exist and is not found in the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of patience does not exist and is not found in the perfection of generosity and the perfection of moral discipline.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of patience do not exist and are not found in the perfection of perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin @53b pa ni /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin @53b pa ni /
translated: The perfection of perseverance

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: does not exist and is not found in the perfection of perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of perseverance is not found and is not apprehended in the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of patient acceptance.🔽The perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patient acceptance, and the perfection of perseverance are not found and are not apprehended in the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of concentration is not found and is not apprehended in the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of concentration does not exist and is not found in the perfections of generosity, of moral discipline, of patience, and of perseverance.🔽The perfections of generosity, of moral discipline, of patience, of perseverance, and of concentration do not exist and are not found in the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The perfection of wisdom does not exist and is not found in the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam @54a *//
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam @54a *//
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not in the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration,

original: gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so // nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom, and is not apprehended.🔽Inner emptiness is not in inner emptiness and is not apprehended.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Inner emptiness is not in outer emptiness and is not apprehended.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Outer emptiness is not in outer emptiness and is not apprehended.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Outer emptiness is not in inner emptiness and is not apprehended.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Inner emptiness and outer emptiness are not in inner and outer emptiness and are not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of external and internal is not in the emptiness of external and internal and is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of external and internal is not in the emptiness of internal and the emptiness of external and is not apprehended.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of internal, the emptiness of external, and the emptiness of external and internal are not in the emptiness of emptiness and are not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is not in the emptiness of emptiness and is not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so /
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is not in the emptiness of internal, the emptiness of external, and the emptiness of external and internal and is not apprehended.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of internal, the emptiness of external, the emptiness of external and internal, and the emptiness of emptiness are not in the emptiness of great emptiness and are not apprehended.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the great is not in the emptiness of the great, and is not found there.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the great is not in the emptiness of the inner, the emptiness of the outer, the emptiness of the inner and outer, or the emptiness of emptiness, and is not found there.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa @54b nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa @54b nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the inner, the emptiness of the outer, the emptiness of the inner and outer, the emptiness of emptiness, and the emptiness of the great are not in the emptiness of what is supreme, and are not found there.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of what is supreme is not in the emptiness of what is supreme, and is not found there.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of what is supreme is not in the emptiness of the inner, the emptiness of the outer, the emptiness of the inner and outer, the emptiness of emptiness, or the emptiness of the great, and is not found there.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, and the emptiness of ultimate reality are non-apprehensible, non-existent, and unattainable in conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Conditioned emptiness is non-apprehensible, non-existent, and unattainable in conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Conditioned emptiness is non-apprehensible, non-existent, and unattainable in the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, and the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, and the emptiness of conditioned phenomena are non-apprehensible, and so on.🔽The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is non-apprehensible, and so on.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is non-apprehensible in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, and so on.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus byas @55a *//
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas @55a *//
translated: The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is non-apprehensible in the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, and the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is non-apprehensible in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: and the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena are non-apprehensible, non-apprehendable, and do not exist in the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the unlimited is non-apprehensible, non-apprehendable, and does not exist in the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of the unlimited is non-apprehensible, non-apprehendable, and does not exist in the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, and the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, and the emptiness of the unlimited are non-apprehensible, non-apprehensible in emptiness.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is non-apprehensible, non-apprehensible in emptiness.🔽The emptiness of all things is non-apprehensible, non-apprehensible in emptiness.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid @55b dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid @55b dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not found and is not apprehended in the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, and the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence are not apprehended in the emptiness of non-apprehension and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is not apprehended in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is not apprehended in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence are not apprehended in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.🔽The emptiness of original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid @56a *//🔽la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid @56a *// la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, and the emptiness of non-dispersal are non-existent and non-apprehensible in the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is non-existent and non-apprehensible in the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is not perceived or apprehended in the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great immensity, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless, and the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is not perceived or apprehended in the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great immensity, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽and the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is beyond limits, the emptiness of no beginning or end, and the emptiness of the primordial nature

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: are not present in the emptiness of all phenomena and cannot be apprehended there.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is not present in the emptiness of all phenomena and cannot be apprehended there.
