translated: The applications of mindfulness do not exist and are not apprehended in the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness do not exist and are not apprehended in the correct exertions.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The correct exertions do not exist and are not apprehended in the correct exertions.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The correct exertions do not exist and are not apprehended in the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness and the correct exertions do not exist and are not apprehended in the bases of supernatural power.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The bases of spiritual power do not exist and are not found in the bases of spiritual power.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The bases of spiritual power do not exist and are not found in the applications of mindfulness,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / @59a *//
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / @59a *//
translated: the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the bases of spiritual power do not exist and are not found in the faculties.

original: dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽dbang po rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so // dbang po rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The faculties do not exist and are not found in the faculties.🔽The faculties do not exist and are not found in the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, and the bases of spiritual power.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po rnams ni stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po rnams ni stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the bases of spiritual power, and the faculties do not exist and are not found in the powers.

original: stobs rnams ni stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stobs rnams ni stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers do not exist and are not found in the powers.

original: stobs rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stobs rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers do not exist and are not found in the aspects of the path.🔽The aspects of the path do not exist and are not found in the aspects of the path.🔽The aspects of the path do not exist and are not found in the powers.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers and aspects of the path do not exist and are not found in the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment do not exist and are not found in the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment do not exist and are not found in the powers and aspects of the path.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni lam la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni lam la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of supernormal  ability, the faculties, the powers, and the limbs of awakening do not exist and are not found in the path.

original: lam ni lam la @59b med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lam ni lam la @59b med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The path does not exist and is not found in the path.

original: lam ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lam ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The path does not exist and is not found in the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of supernormal ability, the faculties, the powers, and the limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The noble truths do not exist and are not found in the noble truths.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The noble truths do not exist and are not found in the meditative concentrations.

original: bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The meditative concentrations do not exist and are not found in the meditative concentrations.

original: bsam gtan rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The meditative concentrations do not exist and are not found in the noble truths.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams ni tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams ni tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The noble truths and the meditative concentrations do not exist in the boundless states and cannot be apprehended.

original: tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The boundless states do not exist in the boundless states and cannot be apprehended.

original: tshad med pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The boundless states do not exist in the noble truths and the meditative concentrations and cannot be apprehended.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The noble truths, the meditative concentrations, and the boundless states do not exist in the formless absorptions and cannot be apprehended.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The formless absorptions do not exist in the formless absorptions and cannot be apprehended.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs @60a *//
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs @60a *//
translated: The formless absorptions do not exist in the noble truths, the meditative concentrations, and the boundless states and cannot be apprehended.🔽The noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the boundless states, and the formless absorptions do not exist in the emptiness of internal phenomena and cannot be apprehended.🔽The emptiness of internal phenomena does not exist in the noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the boundless states, and the formless absorptions and cannot be apprehended.

original: med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The meditative stabilities of the formless realm do not exist and are not found in the aspects of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The aspects of liberation do not exist and are not found in the aspects of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The aspects of liberation do not exist and are not found in the noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, or the formless absorptions.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless absorptions, and the aspects of liberation do not exist and are not found in the serial absorptions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The serial absorptions do not exist and are not found in the serial absorptions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so // 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The formless absorptions do not exist and are not apprehended in the aspects of the noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, and the formless absorptions.🔽The aspects of the noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless absorptions, and the deliverances do not exist and are not apprehended in the gateways of meditative stability.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi @60b dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi @60b dmigs so //
translated: The gateways of meditative stability do not exist and are not apprehended in the gateways of meditative stability.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The gateways to liberation do not exist and are not found in the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, or the serial absorptions.🔽The noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the serial absorptions, and the gateways to liberation do not exist and are not found in the higher knowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The higher knowledges do not exist and are not found in the higher knowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The superknowledges are non-existent and non-apprehensible in the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the deliverances, the complete liberations, and the meditative absorptions.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni /
translated: The noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the deliverances, the complete liberations, and the meditative absorptions are non-existent and non-apprehensible in the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The superknowledges are non-existent and non-apprehensible in the meditative stabilities.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden @61a *//
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden @61a *//
translated: The meditative stabilities are non-existent and non-apprehensible in the meditative stabilities.🔽The meditative stabilities are non-existent and non-apprehensible in the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the deliverances, the complete liberations, and the meditative absorptions.

original: pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the meditative stabilities, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless meditative absorptions, the aspects of liberation, the serial absorptions, the gateways of meditative stability, and the extrasensory powers are non-apprehensible.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
translated: the aspects of the noble truths, the meditative stabilities, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless meditative absorptions, the aspects of liberation, the serial absorptions, the gateways of meditative stability, and the extrasensory powers are non-apprehensible.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the meditative stabilities are non-apprehensible in the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are non-apprehensible in the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang // bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang // bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are not present and are not apprehended in the four noble truths, the dhyānas, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the serial absorptions, the gateways of mnemonic incantation,

original: mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the superknowledges, and the meditative stabilities.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are not present and are not apprehended in the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are not present and are not apprehended in the fearlessnesses.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The fearlessnesses are not present and are not apprehended in the fearlessnesses.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni @61b de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni @61b de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The fearlessnesses are not present and are not apprehended in the powers of the tathāgatas.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni byams pa chen po la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni byams pa chen po la med cing mi dmigs so // byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.

original: byams pa chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byams pa chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas and the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible.🔽The powers of the tathāgat

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po ni snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po ni snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and great love do not exist and are not found in great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs so /snying rje chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres @62a *//
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs so /snying rje chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po la med cing mi dmigs so // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres @62a *//
translated: Great compassion does not exist and is not found in great compassion. Great compassion does not exist and is not found in the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and great love.

original: pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, and great compassion do not exist and are not found in the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The distinct attributes of a buddha do not exist and are not found in the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The powers, fearlessnesses, detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, and great compassion of the tathāgatas do not exist and are not found in the unentangled qualities of a buddha.

original: rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The qualities of the stage of the spiritual lineage do not exist and are not found in the qualities of the stage of the spiritual lineage.

original: rigs kyi sa'i chos ni brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rigs kyi sa'i chos ni brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The qualities of the stage of the spiritual lineage do not exist and are not found in the qualities of the eighth-lowest stage.

original: brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The qualities of the eighth-lowest stage do not exist and are not found in the qualities of the eighth-lowest stage.

original: brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The qualities of the eighth-lowest stage do not exist and are not found in the qualities of the stage of the spiritual lineage.

original: rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The qualities of the stage of the spiritual lineage and the qualities of the eighth-lowest stage do not exist and are not found in the qualities of the stream enterers.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The qualities of the stream enterers do not exist and are not found in the qualities of the stream enterers.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The qualities of a stream enterer are not in the qualities of the stage of potential and the qualities of the eighth and are not found there.

original: rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The qualities of the stage of potential, the qualities of the eighth, and the qualities of a stream enterer are not in the qualities of a once-returner and are not found there.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The qualities of a once-returner are not in the qualities of a once-returner and are not found there.

original: lan @62b gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lan @62b gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The qualities of a once-returner are not in the qualities of the stage of potential, the qualities of the eighth, and the qualities of a stream enterer and are not found there.

original: rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The qualities of the stage of potential, the qualities of the eighth, the qualities of a stream enterer, and the qualities of a once-returner are not in the qualities of a non-returner and are not found there.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The dharmas of a non-returner are not in the dharmas of a non-returner and are not apprehended.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The dharmas of a non-returner are not in the dharmas of the stage of the spiritual lineage, the dharmas of the eighth-lowest stage, the dharmas of a stream enterer, or the dharmas of a once-returner and are not apprehended.

original: rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The dharmas of the stage of the spiritual lineage, the dharmas of the eighth-lowest stage, the dharmas of a stream enterer, the dharmas of a once-returner, and the dharmas of a non-returner are not in the dharmas of an arhat and are not apprehended.

original: dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The dharmas of an arhat are not in the dharmas of an arhat and are not apprehended.

original: dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The qualities of an arhat are not found and are not apprehended in the qualities of the stage of potential, the qualities of the eighth-lowest stage, the qualities of a stream-winner, the qualities of a once-returner, or the qualities of a non-returner.

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The stage of an ordinary being is not found and is not apprehended in the stage of an ordinary being.

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa ni rigs kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa ni rigs kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The stage of an ordinary being is not found and is not apprehended in the stage of potential.

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa ni brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa ni brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The stage of an ordinary being and the stage of potential are not found and are not apprehended in the eighth-lowest stage.

original: brgyad @63a *// pa'i sa ni brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: brgyad @63a *// pa'i sa ni brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eighth-lowest stage is not found and is not apprehended in the eighth-lowest stage.

original: brgyad pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: brgyad pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The eighth-lowest stage is not found and is not apprehended in the stage of an ordinary being and the stage of potential.

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The stage of an ordinary being, the stage of potential, and the eighth-lowest stage are not found and are not apprehended in the stage of seeing.

original: mthong ba'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mthong ba'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The level of seeing does not exist in the level of seeing; it is not found there.

original: mthong ba'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mthong ba'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The level of seeing does not exist in the level of the ordinary person, the spiritual lineage, or the eighth-lowest stage; it is not found there.

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa ni bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa ni bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The level of the ordinary person, the spiritual lineage, the eighth-lowest stage, and the level of seeing do not exist in the stage of thinning; they are not found there.

original: bsrabs pa'i sa ni bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsrabs pa'i sa ni bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The stage of thinning does not exist in the stage of thinning; it is not found there.

original: bsrabs pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsrabs pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The stage of thinning does not exist in the level of the ordinary person, the spiritual lineage, the eighth-lowest stage, or the level of seeing; it is not found there.

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The level of the ordinary person, the spiritual lineage, the eighth-lowest stage, the level of seeing, and the stage of thinning do not exist in the stage of separation from defilements; they are not found there.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The level free from attachment does not exist and is not apprehended in the level free from attachment.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The level free from attachment does not exist and is not apprehended in the ordinary person’s level, the lineage level, the eighth-level, the seeing level, or the thinning level.

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni /
translated: The ordinary person’s level, the lineage level, the eighth-level, the seeing level, the thinning level, and the level free from attachment

original: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: do not exist and are not apprehended in the level of realizing what has been done.

original: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa @63b la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa @63b la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The level of realizing what has been done does not exist and is not apprehended in the level of realizing what has been done.

original: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The level of the one who has something left to do does not exist in the level of the ordinary person, the level of the potential, the eighth-lowest level, the level of insight, the level of thinning, or the level of separation from passion.

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The level of the ordinary person, the level of the potential, the eighth-lowest level, the level of insight, the level of thinning, the level of separation from passion, and the level of the one who has something left to do do not exist in the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The pratyekabuddha level does not exist in the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //🔽so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so // so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The level of the pratyekabuddha does not exist and is not found in the level of ordinary people, the level of the family, the eighth-lowest level, the level of seeing, the level of thinning, the level of separation from desire, or the level of completion.🔽The level of ordinary people, the level of the family, the eighth-lowest level, the level of seeing, the level of thinning, the level of separation from desire, the level of completion, and the level of the pratyekabuddha do not exist and are not found in the bodhisattva levels.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni byang chub sems dpa' sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni byang chub sems dpa' sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva levels do not exist and are not found in the bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs @64a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs @64a *//
translated: The bodhisattva levels are the level of ordinary beings, the level of potential, the eighth level, the level of seeing, the level of thinning, the level of separation from desire, the level of completion, and the level of the pratyekabuddhas.🔽

original: pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva stages do not exist and are not apprehended in the stages of ordinary people, the stages of the family, the eighth stage, the seeing stage, the thin stage, the detached stage, the stage of practicing with will, the pratyekabuddha stage,🔽or the bodhisattva stages.

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The stages of ordinary people, the stages of the family, the eighth stage, the seeing stage, the thin stage, the detached stage, the stage of practicing with will, the pratyekabuddha stage,🔽and the bodhisattva stages do not exist and are not apprehended in the stage of perfect buddhahood.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The stage of perfect buddhahood does not exist and is not apprehended in the stage of perfect buddhahood.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /
translated: The level of a totally perfect buddha is not in and is not apprehended apart from the levels of ordinary people, the levels of the potential, the eighth-­level, the seeing-­level, the thinning-­level, the desire-­free level, the level of realizing what is to be done,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the pratyekabuddha level, and the bodhisattva level.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is not in and is not apprehended in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is not in and is not apprehended in the knowledge of paths.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The knowledge of paths is not in and is not apprehended in the knowledge of paths.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The knowledge of paths is not in and is not apprehended in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la med @64b cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la med @64b cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects, the knowledge of the aspects of the path, and the knowledge of all aspects do not exist and are not found in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects does not exist and is not found in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects does not exist and is not found in the knowledge of all aspects, the knowledge of the aspects of the path, and the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A stream enterer does not exist and is not found in a stream enterer.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A stream enterer does not exist and is not found in a once-returner.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A once-returner does not exist and is not found in a once-returner.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A once-returner does not exist and is not found in a stream enterer.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the stream enterer and the once-returner do not exist and are not found in the non-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The non-returner does not exist and is not found in the non-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The non-returner does not exist and is not found in the stream enterer and the once-returner.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ni dgra bcom pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ni dgra bcom pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The stream enterer, the once-returner, and the non-returner do not exist and are not found in the arhat.

original: dgra bcom pa ni dgra bcom pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa ni dgra bcom pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The arhat does not exist and is not found in the arhat.

original: dgra bcom pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The arhat does not exist and is not found in the stream enterer, the once-returner, and the non-returner.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir ma 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa ni rang sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir ma 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa ni rang sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The stream enterer, the once-returner, the non-returner, and the arhat do not exist and are not found in the pratyekabuddha.

original: rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Pratyekabuddhas do not exist and are not apprehended in a pratyekabuddha.🔽

original: rang sangs rgyas @65a *//
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas @65a *//
translated: A pratyekabuddha does not exist and is not found in a pratyekabuddha.

original: ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A pratyekabuddha does not exist and is not found in a stream enterer, a once-returner, a non-returner, or a worthy one.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A stream enterer, a once-returner, a non-returner, a worthy one, and a pratyekabuddha do not exist and are not found in a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A bodhisattva does not exist and is not found in a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: A bodhisattva does not exist and is not found in a stream enterer, a once-returner, a non-returner, a worthy one, or a pratyekabuddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the stream enterer, the once-returner, the non-returner, the arhat, the pratyekabuddha, and the bodhisattva are nonexistent and non-apprehensible in the Tathā­gata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is nonexistent and non-apprehensible in the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is nonexistent and non-apprehensible in the stream enterer, the once-returner, the non-returner, the arhat, the pratyekabuddha, and the bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is nonexistent and non-apprehensible in the bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is nonexistent and non-apprehensible in the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med @65b cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med @65b cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is not found and is not apprehended in the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is not found and is not apprehended in the bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the bodhisattva and the perfection of wisdom are not found and are not apprehended in instruction and subsequent instruction.

original: gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: instruction and subsequent instruction are not found and are not apprehended in instruction and subsequent instruction.

original: gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: instruction and subsequent instruction are not found and are not apprehended in the bodhisattva and the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na chos thams cad med cing dmigs su med pas /
analyzed: de ltar na chos thams cad med cing dmigs su med pas /
translated: in that way, since all phenomena are not found and are not apprehended,

original: byang chub sems dpa' med cing dmigs su med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med cing dmigs su med do //
translated: the bodhisattva is not found and is not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: “What is the reason for that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam yin zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam yin zhes zer ba ni /
translated: ‘Bodhisattva’ is merely a designation.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste /🔽de'i phyir 'di lta ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste / de'i phyir 'di lta ste /
translated: ‘Bodhisattva’ is a designation that has been given adventitiously.

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‘Bodhisattva’ is merely a designation.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste /
translated: ‘Form,’ ‘feeling,’ ‘perception,’ ‘volitional factors,’ and ‘consciousness’ are designations that have been given adventitiously.

original: 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
analyzed: 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
translated: It is like this: a name does not come from anywhere,

original: gang du'ang mi 'gro /
analyzed: gang du'ang mi 'gro /
translated: it does not go anywhere,

original: gang na'ang mi gnas so //
analyzed: gang na'ang mi gnas so //
translated: and it does not stay anywhere.

original: ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin /🔽@66a *// de ni tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin / @66a *// de ni tshor ba ma yin /
translated: What is called a mere name is not form.🔽It is not feeling.

original: de ni 'du shes ma yin /
analyzed: de ni 'du shes ma yin /
translated: It is not perception.

original: de ni 'du byed ma yin /
analyzed: de ni 'du byed ma yin /
translated: It is not volitional factors.

original: de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: It is like this: a name is empty of the intrinsic nature of a name.

original: stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te /🔽de'i phyir 'di lta ste /
analyzed: stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te / de'i phyir 'di lta ste /
translated: What is empty is not a name.🔽Therefore, this is called a mere name, namely,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o //
translated: ‘bodhisattva.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu 'di lta ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu 'di lta ste /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra, it is like this:

original: mig ces bya ba dang / rna ba zhes bya ba dang / sna zhes bya ba dang / lce zhes bya ba dang / lus zhes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste /
analyzed: mig ces bya ba dang / rna ba zhes bya ba dang / sna zhes bya ba dang / lce zhes bya ba dang / lus zhes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste /
translated: ‘Eye,’ ‘ear,’ ‘nose,’ ‘tongue,’ ‘body,’ and ‘mind’ are names that are suddenly designated.

original: 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
analyzed: 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
translated: It is like this: a name does not come from anywhere,

original: gang du'ang mi 'gro gang na'ang mi gnas so //
analyzed: gang du'ang mi 'gro gang na'ang mi gnas so //
translated: does not go anywhere, and does not remain anywhere.

original: ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin /
analyzed: ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin /
translated: What is called a mere name is not the eye.

original: de ni rna ba ma yin /🔽de ni sna ma yin /
analyzed: de ni rna ba ma yin / de ni sna ma yin /
translated: It is not the ear.🔽It is not the nose.

original: de ni lce ma yin /
analyzed: de ni lce ma yin /
translated: It is not the tongue.

original: de ni lus ma yin /
analyzed: de ni lus ma yin /
translated: It is not the body.

original: de ni yid ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni yid ma yin no //
translated: It is not the thinking mind.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: It is because a name is empty of the intrinsic nature of a name.

original: stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te /🔽de'i phyir 'di lta ste /
analyzed: stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te / de'i phyir 'di lta ste /
translated: That which is empty is not a name.🔽Therefore, this is called a mere name, namely,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o //
translated: ‘bodhisattva.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba dang / sgra zhes bya ba dang / dri zhes bya ba dang / ro zhes bya ba dang / reg ces bya ba dang / chos zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o //

translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?🔽Because both that which is a name and that which is the perfection of patience do not exist and are not perceived.🔽Therefore, this—namely, a bodhisattva—is merely a name.🔽The perfection of perseverance is merely a name.🔽A perfection of perseverance is not a name,

analyzed: 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te /
translated: and a name is not a perfection of perseverance.🔽And why?🔽Because both that which is a name and that which is the perfection of perseverance do not exist and are not perceived.

original: de'i phyir 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di lta ste /
translated: Therefore, this—namely, a bodhisattva—is merely a name.🔽The perfection of concentration is merely a name.🔽A perfection of concentration is not a name,🔽and a name is not a perfection of concentration.🔽And why?🔽Because both that which is a name and that which is the perfection of concentration do not exist and are not perceived.🔽Therefore, this—namely, a bodhisattva—is merely a name.🔽The perfection of wisdom is merely a name.🔽A perfection of wisdom is not a name,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo //
translated: and a name is not a perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: And why?🔽Because both that which is a name and that which is the perfection of wisdom do not exist and are not perceived.🔽Therefore, this—namely, a bodhisattva—is merely a name.🔽The applications of mindfulness are merely names.🔽Applications of mindfulness are not names,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming tsam ste /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming tsam ste /
translated: and names are not applications of mindfulness.🔽And why?

analyzed: ming la'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @69a *//
translated: Because both that which is a name and that which is the applications of mindfulness do not exist and are not perceived.🔽Therefore, this—namely, a bodhisattva—is merely a name.🔽The right efforts are merely names.🔽Right efforts are not names,

original: med / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do //
analyzed: med / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do //
translated: and names are not right efforts.
