analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu med cing mi dmigs na /
translated: If a tathāgata, worthy one, perfectly complete buddha is utterly nonexistent and non-apprehensible,

original: de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod /
analyzed: de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod /
translated: how could it be established?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na bdag bdag ces kyang bya ste /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na bdag bdag ces kyang bya ste /
translated: for that reason it is said that ‘self’ is also a mere convention,

original: bdag shin tu mngon par 'grub pa med do //
analyzed: bdag shin tu mngon par 'grub pa med do //
translated: but the self is utterly unestablished.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang gang chos thams cad kyang de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin nam zhes zer ba de ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang gang chos thams cad kyang de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin nam zhes zer ba de ni /
translated: in the same way, all phenomena are also the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just so, just so!

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: it is because there is no intrinsic nature that arises from a combination.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāradvatīputra said,🔽🔽

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāradvatīputra then said, Venerable Subhūti,

original: gang la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa yin /
analyzed: gang la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa yin /
translated: what is it that has no essence that arises from the composite?

original: smras pa / gzugs la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: smras pa / gzugs la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Subhūti replied, Form has no essence that arises from the composite.🔽Feeling has no essence that arises from the composite.

original: 'du shes la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: 'du shes la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Perception has no essence that arises from the composite.

original: 'du byed la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: 'du byed la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Disposition has no essence that arises from the composite.

original: rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽tshe dang ldan pa @82a *//
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // tshe dang ldan pa @82a *//
translated: Consciousness has no essence that arises from the composite.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: mig la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽rna ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽sna la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: mig la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // rna ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // sna la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the eyes have no essence that arises from the composite.🔽The ears have no essence that arises from the composite.🔽The nose has no essence that arises from the composite.

original: lce la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: lce la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The tongue has no essence that arises from the composite.

original: lus la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: lus la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The body has no essence that arises from a combination of things.

original: yid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: yid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The mind has no essence that arises from a combination of things.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzugs la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gzugs la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: form has no essence that arises from a combination of things.

original: sgra la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽dri la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽ro la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: sgra la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // dri la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // ro la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Sound has no essence that arises from a combination of things.🔽Smell has no essence that arises from a combination of things.🔽Taste has no essence that arises from a combination of things.

original: reg la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: reg la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Touch has no essence that arises from a combination of things.

original: chos la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: chos la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Phenomena have no essence that arises from a combination of things.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: eye consciousness has no essence that arises from a combination of things.🔽Ear consciousness has no essence that arises from a combination of things.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Nose consciousness has no essence that arises from a combination of things.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the tongue consciousness has no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the body consciousness has no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: and the mind consciousness has no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid @82b med do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid @82b med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: eye contact has no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;🔽ear contact has no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;🔽nose contact has no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: tongue contact has no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: body contact has no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: and mind contact has no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the feeling that arises from the contact of the eye has no essence that arises from a combination.🔽The feeling that arises from the contact of the ear has no essence that arises from a combination.🔽The feeling that arises from the contact of the nose has no essence that arises from a combination.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The feeling that arises from the contact of the tongue has no essence that arises from a combination.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The feeling that arises from the contact of the body has no essence that arises from a combination.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The feeling that arises from the contact of the mind has no essence that arises from a combination.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sa'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: sa'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the earth element has no essence that arises from a combination.

original: chu'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: chu'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The water element has no essential nature that comes together or arises.

original: me'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽rlung gi khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: me'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // rlung gi khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The fire element has no essential nature that comes together or arises.🔽The wind element has no essential nature that comes together or arises.

original: nam mkha'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The space element has no essential nature that comes together or arises.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The consciousness element has no essential nature that comes together or arises.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽ma rig pa la @83a *//
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / ma rig pa la @83a *//
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: ignorance has no essential nature that comes together or arises.

original: 'du byed la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: 'du byed la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Conditioned action has no essential nature that comes together or arises.

original: rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Consciousness has no essential nature that comes together or arises.

original: ming dang gzugs la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Name and form have no essential nature that comes together or arises.

original: skye mched drug la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The six sense sources have no essential nature that comes together or arises.

original: reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Contact has no nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽sred pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // sred pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Sensation has no nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.🔽Craving has no nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: len pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽srid pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: len pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // srid pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Grasping has no nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.🔽Becoming has no nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: skye ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: skye ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Birth has no nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: rga shi la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: rga shi la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Aging and death have no nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the perfection of generosity has no nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The perfection of moral discipline has no nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The perfection of patience has no nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The transcendent perfection of perseverance has no essential nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The transcendent perfection of meditative concentration has no essential nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The transcendent perfection of wisdom has no essential nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: nang stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽phyi stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung @83b ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // phyi stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung @83b ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: inner emptiness has no essential nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.🔽Outer emptiness has no essential nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness has no essential nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Emptiness of emptiness has no essential nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Great emptiness has no essential nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate has no essential nature that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: In the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, there is no conditioned phenomenon.🔽In the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, there is no unconditioned phenomenon.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do /
translated: In the emptiness of the unlimited, there is no unlimited.🔽In the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, there is no beginning or end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: In the emptiness of non-rejection, there is no rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 'du pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 'du pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: In the emptiness of inherent existence, there is no inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: In the emptiness of all phenomena, there is no phenomenon.🔽In the emptiness of specific characteristics, there are no specific characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: In the emptiness of non-apprehension, there is no apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension has no essential nature that comes together or disperses.🔽The emptiness of essential nature has no essential nature that comes together or disperses.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension of an intrinsic nature has no essential nature that comes together or disperses.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the applications of mindfulness have no essential nature that comes together or disperses.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo @84a nyid med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo @84a nyid med do //
translated: The right efforts have no essential nature that comes together or disperses.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽dbang po rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // dbang po rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The legs of miraculous power have no essential nature that comes together or disperses.🔽The faculties have no essential nature that comes together or disperses.

original: stobs rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: stobs rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The powers have no essential nature that comes together or disperses.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the limbs of awakening have no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the noble eightfold path has no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the truths of the noble ones have no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;

original: bsam gtan rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽tshad med pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // tshad med pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the meditative concentrations have no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;🔽the immeasurable aspirations have no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the formless absorptions have no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the eight aspects of liberation have no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the nine serial steps of meditative absorption have no essence that arises from a combination of causes and conditions;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are not entities that arise from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The superknowledges are not entities that arise from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The meditative stabilizations are not entities that arise from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are not entities that arise from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 'du ba las @84b byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 'du ba las @84b byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas are not entities that arise from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The four fearlessnesses are not entities that arise from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //🔽byams pa chen po la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do // byams pa chen po la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges are not entities that arise from a combination of causes and conditions.🔽Great love is not an entity that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: snying rje chen po la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Great compassion is not an entity that arises from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas have no essential nature that converges.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: for this reason all phenomena are essentially unreal.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
